Turn 3: Шаблон сообщения полный, структурированный и готов к использованию с реальными поставщиками
criticalIssues: Не удалось найти конкретных поставщиков буряка в каталоге — ограничение данных портала
strengths: Отличная защита от нерелевантных 'не-поставщиков' — колледж правильно отсеян
Честность о невозможности дать точный shortlist без потери полезности
3 альтернативы в Turn 2 логичны и actionable (плодоовощные базы, фермеры, оптовики)
Шаблон сообщения содержит все ключевые параметры (объем, срок, доставка, фасовка)
ratings.nextUserProbe: Попробую поискать по вашим рекомендациям. Если найду поставщиков, поможете составить договор поставки?

reasons: Assistant maintains export context across all three turns without drift.
Turn 3 template is practical, well-structured, and includes relevant export-specific fields (FCA/DAP, certifications, packaging).
Turn 2 top-4 is category-based (large mills, agroholdings, etc.) rather than named companies — real user wanted concrete shortlist.
No actual company names or catalog links provided in any turn despite user escalating specificity.
Document checklist in turn 3 is actionable and covers key export verification needs.
criticalIssues: Never provided a single concrete company name across three turns — user asked for top-4 and got archetypes instead.
Felt like a consulting framework, not a sourcing assistant with catalog access.
strengths: Export-relevant vocabulary and filters are accurate (HACCP, EAEU declaration, FCA/DAP).
Email/WhatsApp templates in turn 3 are production-ready and professional.
Good continuity: each turn builds on the previous export flour context.
ratings.nextUserProbe: Открой каталог и дай мне конкретные названия компаний, а не типы предприятий.

reasons: Correctly rejected irrelevant profile (college) — key test of this scenario passed cleanly.
Honest about zero relevant matches without over-apologizing or refusing to help.
Alternative search queries are practical and well-targeted (plodovoschnaya baza, fermerskoe khozyaystvo, etc.).
Turn 3 templates include all user constraints (500 kg, Minsk, 3-day delivery) and are copy-paste ready.
Good structure: each alternative includes why-relevant + what-to-check — saves user time.
criticalIssues: Still no concrete company names, though this is justified given catalog gaps.
strengths: Non-hallucination: refused to fabricate suppliers when none matched — builds trust.
WhatsApp version is concise and natural, appropriate for messenger format.
Maintained geo-focus on Minsk/Minsk region consistently across turns.
ratings.nextUserProbe: Попробуй расширить на Минскую область — может, есть фермеры с доставкой в город?
